title: Trump vows action on gun background checks
text:
Trump vows action on gun background checks 1:01am GMT - 01:49 
U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday vowed to take steps to improve background checks for gun buyers in the wake of last week's deadly Florida high school shooting as hundreds of students joined scattered protests around the United States. Student survivors and a parent of one of the victims from Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School shooting spoke to the president during the White House listening session. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
